heroData.caption: JAMstack websites
heroData.subTitle: Get your website an unfair advantage in SERP rankings. We build JAMstack websites with battle-tested SSG technologies and most popular headless CMS.

infoData.caption: what is jamstack
infoData.title: A modern web development architecture
infoData.subTitle: Jamstack approach enables you to run a fully dynamic site while the actual assets are pre-rendered static files deployed on CDN. For you, it means faster, more secure, more reliable websites with better SEO ranking capabilities and happier users overall.

more.content: Want to find out more about what JAMstack means ?

data.title: Excellent performance
data.content: No database means no time-consuming multiple queries. Static sites are faster sites, even up to 10x.

data.title: SEO Advantage
data.content: Going static also means better ranking possibilities, what equals more traffic and more $$$.

data.title: Easy content management
data.content: Headless CMS-es lets you build websites that are both easy to use and customizable

data.title: Lower costs
data.content: Traffic bigger than usual? Not an issue, JAMstack websites are fast and don't cost a fortune
